title: Guide to the Airship Adventures Quest! | Stormfall Saga Of Survival Gameplay (Ep 99)

tasks.task: Performing a quest in Saga of Survival
subtasks: Checking the Vault for the Adventurer's Quest
Activating the limited-time adventure zone on the map
Moving through the zone to assist the pilot
Engaging in combat with goblins and collecting loot
Interacting with a lever to progress through the quest
Harvesting resources such as wood, charcoals, and berries
Identifying and destroying curse and dark frogs
Experiencing changes in crossbow firing rate
Using a horse for transportation within the zone
Claiming rewards for completing the Adventurer's Quest
General exploration and looting of the zone

tasks.task: Performing a quest in Saga of Survival
activating it, entering the zone, combat, gathering resources, interacting with the environment, using tools, getting around with a horse.

Performing a quest in Saga of Survival. Subtasks related to moving, combat, gathering, tool use, navigation, and NPC interaction, like moving through the zone to assist the pilot, battling goblins, collecting timber, identifying and eliminating frogs, etc.
Performing a quest in Saga of Survival
subtasks: Activating the limited-time airship adventure zone
Exploring the zone to locate the fallen airship and assist the pilot
Engaging in combat with goblins and other enemies
Identifying and destroying specific creatures (e.g., curse frogs)
Interacting with environmental elements (e.g., levers, barrels)
Using melee and ranged weapons (swords and crossbows) as needed
